body_html:
one line change in decode_csv_op.cc
works for me:
change line 172:
while (static_cast<size_t>(current_idx) < input.size()) {
to
while (static_cast<size_t>(current_idx) < input.size() && result->size()<out_type_.size()) {

The modified version (DecodeCSVFirstNOp) can be found here: DecodeCSVFirstNOp

body:
one line change in [decode_csv_op.cc](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/decode_csv_op.cc)
works for me:
change line 172:
`      while (static_cast<size_t>(current_idx) < input.size()) {`
to 
` while (static_cast<size_t>(current_idx) < input.size() && result->size()<out_type_.size()) {
`

The modified version (DecodeCSVFirstNOp) can be found here:  [DecodeCSVFirstNOp](https://github.com/cherishlc/tensorflow_ext/blob/master/CPPModules/decode_csv_first_n.cc)
